survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer usage patterns, preferences, and satisfaction levels with home fitness equipment purchased in the last 12 months.

questions.question_text: Which types of home fitness equipment have you purchased or used in the last 12 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to capture diverse equipment usage. Include an 'Other' option with open-text field for uncommon equipment.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE checkbox with an open-text follow-up for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which types of home fitness equipment have you purchased or used in the last 12 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use your home fitness equipment per week?
questions.routing_logic: Show only if Q1 has at least one selection
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Consider benchmarking against industry averages.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use your home fitness equipment per week?
script.routing_logic: Show only if Q1 has at least one selection

questions.question_text: What factors influenced your purchase decision for home fitness equipment? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Limit selections to 3 to prioritize key decision drivers. Include an open-text 'Other' option.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with max 3 selections and open-text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors influenced your purchase decision for home fitness equipment? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your home fitness equipment overall?
questions.routing_logic: Show only if Q1 has at least one selection
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale for consistency in satisfaction metrics.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE radio buttons in a horizontal layout.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your home fitness equipment overall?
script.routing_logic: Show only if Q1 has at least one selection

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your home fitness equipment?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure mobile-friendly text box.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT with a large input box.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your home fitness equipment?
